title: Club X: Prequel to Highest Bidder Series
description: Everything has a price … and I’m willing to pay.  I trust no one. I thrive with control and I’ve learned to be ruthless and cold-hearted. I’m not interested in love, but I still have desires.  That’s where Club X comes in... and then I met her. She changed everything.  From USA Today best selling authors Willow Winters and Lauren Landish comes an addictive club you can't resist. Club X is a short prologue to the standalone, Bought.
author: Lauren Landish
